pli-tv-bu-vb-ss1:0.5: Ime kho panāyasmanto terasa saṅghādisesā dhammā uddesaṁ āgacchanti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss1:1.1.1: Tena samayena buddho bhagavā sāvatthiyaṁ viharati jetavane anāthapiṇḍikassa ārāme.
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss1:1.1.2: Tena kho pana samayena āyasmā seyyasako anabhirato brahmacariyaṁ carati.
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss1:1.1.3: So tena kiso hoti lūkho dubbaṇṇo uppaṇḍuppaṇḍukajāto dhamanisanthatagatto.
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss1:1.1.4: Addasa kho āyasmā udāyī āyasmantaṁ seyyasakaṁ kisaṁ lūkhaṁ dubbaṇṇaṁ uppaṇḍuppaṇḍukajātaṁ dhamanisanthatagattaṁ. Disvāna āyasmantaṁ seyyasakaṁ etadavoca—
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss1:1.1.5: “kissa tvaṁ, āvuso seyyasaka, kiso lūkho dubbaṇṇo uppaṇḍuppaṇḍukajāto dhamanisanthatagatto?
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss1:1.1.6: Kacci no tvaṁ, āvuso seyyasaka, anabhirato brahmacariyaṁ carasī”ti?
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss1:1.1.8: “Tena hi tvaṁ, āvuso seyyasaka, yāvadatthaṁ bhuñja yāvadatthaṁ supa yāvadatthaṁ nhāya.
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss1:1.1.9: Yāvadatthaṁ bhuñjitvā yāvadatthaṁ supitvā yāvadatthaṁ nhāyitvā yadā te anabhirati uppajjati rāgo cittaṁ anuddhaṁseti tadā hatthena upakkamitvā asuciṁ mocehī”ti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss1:1.1.10: “Kiṁ nu kho, āvuso, kappati evarūpaṁ kātun”ti?
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss1:1.1.12: Atha kho āyasmā seyyasako yāvadatthaṁ bhuñji yāvadatthaṁ supi yāvadatthaṁ nhāyi.
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss1:1.1.13: Yāvadatthaṁ bhuñjitvā yāvadatthaṁ supitvā yāvadatthaṁ nhāyitvā yadā anabhirati uppajjati rāgo cittaṁ anuddhaṁseti tadā hatthena upakkamitvā asuciṁ mocesi.
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss1:1.1.14: Atha kho āyasmā seyyasako aparena samayena vaṇṇavā ahosi pīṇindriyo pasannamukhavaṇṇo vippasannachavivaṇṇo.
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss1:1.1.15: Atha kho āyasmato seyyasakassa sahāyakā bhikkhū āyasmantaṁ seyyasakaṁ etadavocuṁ—
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss1:1.1.16: “pubbe kho tvaṁ, āvuso seyyasaka, kiso ahosi lūkho dubbaṇṇo uppaṇḍuppaṇḍukajāto dhamanisanthatagatto.
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss1:1.1.17: So dāni tvaṁ etarahi vaṇṇavā pīṇindriyo pasannamukhavaṇṇo vippasannachavivaṇṇo.
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss1:1.1.18: Kiṁ nu kho tvaṁ, āvuso seyyasaka, bhesajjaṁ karosī”ti?
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss1:1.1.20: Api cāhaṁ yāvadatthaṁ bhuñjāmi yāvadatthaṁ supāmi yāvadatthaṁ nhāyāmi.
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss1:1.1.21: Yāvadatthaṁ bhuñjitvā yāvadatthaṁ supitvā yāvadatthaṁ nhāyitvā yadā me anabhirati uppajjati rāgo cittaṁ anuddhaṁseti tadā hatthena upakkamitvā asuciṁ mocemī”ti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss1:1.2.1: “Kiṁ pana tvaṁ, āvuso seyyasaka, yeneva hatthena saddhādeyyaṁ bhuñjasi teneva hatthena upakkamitvā asuciṁ mocesī”ti?
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss1:1.2.3: Ye te bhikkhū appicchā …pe… te ujjhāyanti khiyyanti vipācenti—
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss1:1.2.4: “kathañhi nāma āyasmā seyyasako hatthena upakkamitvā asuciṁ mocessatī”ti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss1:1.2.5: Atha kho te bhikkhū āyasmantaṁ seyyasakaṁ anekapariyāyena vigarahitvā bhagavato etamatthaṁ ārocesuṁ.
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss1:1.2.6: Atha kho bhagavā etasmiṁ nidāne etasmiṁ pakaraṇe bhikkhusaṅghaṁ sannipātāpetvā āyasmantaṁ seyyasakaṁ paṭipucchi—
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss1:1.2.7: “saccaṁ kira tvaṁ, seyyasaka, hatthena upakkamitvā asuciṁ mocesī”ti?
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss1:1.2.10: “ananucchavikaṁ, moghapurisa, ananulomikaṁ appatirūpaṁ assāmaṇakaṁ akappiyaṁ akaraṇīyaṁ.
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss1:1.2.11: Kathañhi nāma tvaṁ, moghapurisa, hatthena upakkamitvā asuciṁ mocessasi.
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss1:1.2.12: Nanu mayā, moghapurisa, anekapariyāyena virāgāya dhammo desito no sarāgāya,
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss1:1.2.15: Tattha nāma tvaṁ, moghapurisa, mayā virāgāya dhamme desite sarāgāya cetessasi, visaññogāya dhamme desite saññogāya cetessasi, anupādānāya dhamme desite saupādānāya cetessasi.
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss1:1.2.16: Nanu mayā, moghapurisa, anekapariyāyena rāgavirāgāya dhammo desito, madanimmadanāya pipāsavinayāya ālayasamugghātāya vaṭṭupacchedāya taṇhākkhayāya virāgāya nirodhāya nibbānāya dhammo desito?
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss1:1.2.17: Nanu mayā, moghapurisa, anekapariyāyena kāmānaṁ pahānaṁ akkhātaṁ, kāmasaññānaṁ pariññā akkhātā, kāmapipāsānaṁ paṭivinayo akkhāto, kāmavitakkānaṁ samugghāto akkhāto, kāmapariḷāhānaṁ vūpasamo akkhāto?
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss1:1.2.18: Netaṁ, moghapurisa, appasannānaṁ vā pasādāya, pasannānaṁ vā bhiyyobhāvāya.
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss1:1.2.19: Atha khvetaṁ, moghapurisa, appasannānañceva appasādāya, pasannānañca ekaccānaṁ aññathattāyā”ti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss1:1.2.20: Atha kho bhagavā āyasmantaṁ seyyasakaṁ anekapariyāyena vigarahitvā dubbharatāya …pe…
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss1:1.2.21: evañca pana, bhikkhave, imaṁ sikkhāpadaṁ uddiseyyātha—
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss1:1.2.23: Evañcidaṁ bhagavatā bhikkhūnaṁ sikkhāpadaṁ paññattaṁ hoti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss1:2.1.1: Tena kho pana samayena bhikkhū paṇītabhojanāni bhuñjitvā muṭṭhassatī asampajānā niddaṁ okkamanti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss1:2.1.2: Tesaṁ muṭṭhassatīnaṁ asampajānānaṁ niddaṁ okkamantānaṁ supinantena asuci muccati.
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss1:2.1.8: Kacci nu kho mayaṁ saṅghādisesaṁ āpattiṁ āpannā”ti?
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss1:2.1.12: Evañca pana, bhikkhave, imaṁ sikkhāpadaṁ uddiseyyātha—
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss1:2.2.5: nīlaṁ pītakaṁ lohitakaṁ odātaṁ takkavaṇṇaṁ dakavaṇṇaṁ telavaṇṇaṁ khīravaṇṇaṁ dadhivaṇṇaṁ sappivaṇṇaṁ.
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss1:2.2.11: saṅghova tassā āpattiyā parivāsaṁ deti, mūlāya paṭikassati, mānattaṁ deti, abbheti; na sambahulā, na ekapuggalo. Tena vuccati—“saṅghādiseso”ti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss1:2.2.12: Tasseva āpattinikāyassa nāmakammaṁ adhivacanaṁ. Tenapi vuccati—“saṅghādiseso”ti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss1:3.2.36: nīlaṁ bhavissati, pītakaṁ bhavissati, lohitakaṁ bhavissati, odātaṁ bhavissati, takkavaṇṇaṁ bhavissati, dakavaṇṇaṁ bhavissati, telavaṇṇaṁ bhavissati, khīravaṇṇaṁ bhavissati, dadhivaṇṇaṁ bhavissati, sappivaṇṇaṁ bhavissatīti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss1:3.3.1: Ajjhattarūpe ceteti upakkamati muccati, āpatti saṅghādisesassa.

pli-tv-bu-vb-ss1:3.8.1: Nīlaṁ mocessāmīti ceteti upakkamati pītakaṁ muccati, āpatti saṅghādisesassa.

pli-tv-bu-vb-ss1:5.1.1: Tena kho pana samayena aññatarassa bhikkhuno supinantena asuci mucci.
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss1:5.1.3: “bhagavatā sikkhāpadaṁ paññattaṁ, kacci nu kho ahaṁ saṅghādisesaṁ āpattiṁ āpanno”ti?
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss1:5.2.1: Tena kho pana samayena aññatarassa bhikkhuno uccāraṁ karontassa asuci mucci.
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss1:5.2.6: Tena kho pana samayena aññatarassa bhikkhuno passāvaṁ karontassa asuci mucci.
